dcterms:creator: S. Lopez
dcterms:description: This dataset includes EEG recordings with annotations for abnormal patterns, including patients' clinical history and expert comments. It contains both positive samples with abnormalities and negative samples of normal EEG.
dcterms:title: TUH EEG Abnormal

dcterms:creator: I. Obeid
J. Picone
dcterms:description: This dataset contains normal EEG signals and EEG signals affected by various types of artifacts, including chewing, eye movements, muscular artifacts, shivering, and instrumental artifacts.
dcterms:title: TUH EEG Artifact

dcterms:creator: V. Shah
E. Von Weltin
S. Lopez
J. R. McHugh
L. Veloso
M. Golmohammadi
dcterms:description: This dataset includes EEG recordings affected by different types of seizures, with annotations provided by trained medical doctors. It contains samples of both focal and generalized seizures.
dcterms:title: TUH EEG Seizure
